description: A psychology student invites a group of his friends and teacher to a drug and alcohol-fueled party where he plans to murder them all.
keywords: dark humor,slasher,murder,abbreviation in title,period in title
name: R.S.V.P.

review.name: Predictable yet voluntarly a very good flick.
review.reviewBody: R.S.V.P. was just released here on DVD and I picked it up at the movie store because it had Jason Mewes in it. I didn't know what to expect, I didn't even read the box cover! Though I stumbled upon a great find, the movie itself is worth the few bucks to rent. A real good cast as well of young actors and actresses who are trying to shine out and get noticed. The story is about "Nick" a guy who is obsessed with murder. His friends think he's a little strange, taking after his professor. Well his ex girl hooked up with his best buddy who comes from a very well off family. Nick acted like everything was all gravy and since it was his last night in town (literally!) he decides to throw him a party! And all of his friends are invited... only thing is, not everyone is going home in one piece!
